comment: Dr. Shaheen is a very smart, experienced professor, and you will be prepared to help struggling readers after this class.  The class is a TON of work, but relevant and necessary.  She is very friendly and willing to help you in any way that she can IF you ask for it.  It is a tough class but certainly passable if you work hard.
DO NOT take her for online class. Entire thing is more work than any other class I have ever taken and its ALL group work which is extremely hard to do with an online class. RUN for your life!!!!
online class was a mess! Very stressful to figure out and massive amounts of GROUP work online. The whole reason you take online is because you CANT BE ON CAMPUS! DO NOT Take this professor online.

I had her for the online version of this class. Nobody ever knew what was going on. Information was very scattered across Vista. She is helpful and did answer questions, but you will always be wondering what is due and whether or not you've missed something. Extremely unorganized.

Her classes are OVERWHELMING at first, she totally overloads the reading and discussion question responses up front in the first 3 or so weeks of class.  If you can take her in a hybrid class, DO IT.  After the required reading is done and the discussion questions are posted, the class really gets down to business of teaching reading.  LOVED IT.

Great professor. I was overwhelmed the first few weeks of class, but if you stick with it, she is very understandable and all assignments have a soft due date. If she sees that the class does not understand the material she will give more time. Overall a great professor that really knows what she is talking about. Very helpful during office hours.

She is very unorganized and unclear. Deadlines were always changing so it felt like there was always a ton of work 24/7. She is very nice, and wants all of her students to gain knowledge from this experience. If you can handle being unorganized, it's an easy A!
I had her for paymaster and she was amazing I learned so much, it was fast pase course but she wa so involved and dorignized I love her class!

First: buy the book, make copies, then return it! You only use it once & only a few pages! The beginning of the semester was VERY frustrating because she was unclear with ALL assignments. But everything improved as the semester went on and we finished early. No tests, no final. Pretty "easy" A because the work isn't hard, but it is time consuming!
I didn't like this teacher at first because things were really unclear and unorganized. However, over the course of the semester things improved. She was helpful about giving feedback on assignments.

Dr. Shaheen is the most confusing and disorganized teacher ever. I would never take her again. This class was a hybrid class and she did not tell us it was a hybrid class until the night before class began. Whenever I tried to email her and ask questions she was very rude with her remarks and she would just told me to look at the syllabus.

By far THE MOST unorganized teacher at KSU.  You are guaranteed to be lost & totally confused in this class. I don't believe I learned a thing, other than what not to do!  I did receive an A but was lost the entire semester.  Teacher is very unclear, changes due dates and overall very scatter brained! Avoid her if at all possible, TRUST ME!

She is by far the worst professor I've ever had. She is so unclear on things she wants, constantly changes due dates, and tell each individual student something different. She is also extremely disorganized. I had her for both 3330 and 3340 and is the same way in both classes. Do NOT take her unless you want to be confused the entire semester.
Very nice and knowledgeable professor.  This class is a lot of work, but she tries to do it in steps and tries to keep you from having tons left at the end of the semester.
Cake class. I learned absolutely nothing. My whole class had no clue about assignments because she continually changed things around.
Fantastic teacher. She lives what she teaches. Very personable. You must put forth the effort and she makes class fun so you don't realize that you're learning.
